articles.content: The lead drug at Centrexion Therapeutics a biotech helmed by former Pfizer CEO Jeff Kindler and chaired by Celgene co-founder Sol Barer has flunked a Phase III test in osteoarthritis knee pain, Endpo… [+1315 chars]
